pyramid.label: Riemann (Apex)
pyramid.tip: Oscillatory correspondence: normalized small-offset fluctuations align with imaginary parts γ of ζ(s) zeros.

pyramid.label: HL / k-tuples / PNT
pyramid.tip: Density frameworks: UPP provides the existence floor; HL gives abundance; PNT provides the scale π(x) ~ x/log x.

pyramid.label: Andrica
pyramid.tip: Sustained small gaps suppress large jumps of √p: heuristic enforcement of √p_{k+1} − √p_k < 1.

pyramid.label: Polignac / Twins
pyramid.tip: Non-vanishing mass for each small t ⇒ all even gaps recur; t=1 yields twins (Δ=2) infinitely often.

pyramid.label: Legendre / Oppermann
pyramid.tip: Two-sided coverage near squares; deserts near n² excluded by UPP small-offset density.

pyramid.label: Bertrand
pyramid.tip: From constructive Goldbach pair, q = x + t > x gives a prime in (x, 2x).

pyramid.label: Goldbach (constructive)
pyramid.tip: Minimal symmetric pair (p, q) around x = E/2 with t on the Cramér scale.

pyramid.label: UPP — Unified Prime Principle
pyramid.tip: Foundational law: f(E) = t/(log E)^2 stabilizes with non-vanishing small-t mass; provides mechanism and scale.

ladder.title: UPP

ladder.note: All even gaps 2k recur (non-vanishing mass for each small t).

ladder.note: Heuristic suppression of √p jumps (< 1) via small gaps.
